reviewText: i needed this for work.  it's a great documentary
Delightful vignettes of gay men and women young and old and of various ethnic groups
Excellent DVD.  I loved it!  I highly recommend this DVD to everyone.

I showed this to my college human sexuality class and my students loved it. They truly appreciated the diverse perspectives as far as age and LGBTQA status and were really fascinated by the historical perspectives offered by some of the older individuals interviewed. I will definitely be using this video when I teach this class again.

If you've seen and remember 'Word Is Out,' this is not 'W.i. O.' 2. While I remember every scene in the former as if it were yesterday, and learned from every one interviewed within it, a few months after having seen this documentary, I can barely recall its contents. The new HBO documentary is far better in this regard, but neither matches up to 'Word is Out.'
